title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
short: Direct income support to small & marginal farmers
description: Provides income support of â‚¹6,000 per year to eligible farmers in three equal instalments. Beneficiaries must register and provide land details to avail benefits.

title: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides periodic soil testing, a Soil Health Card with nutrient status, and fertilizer recommendations to optimize input use and increase yield.

title: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
short: Affordable credit for crop & allied inputs
description: Provides short-term credit to farmers for crop production, post-harvest expenses, and working capital. Offers flexible repayment and lower interest compared to informal credit.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
short: Crop insurance to reduce risk from loss
description: Comprehensive crop insurance scheme that gives financial support to farmers suffering crop loss/damage from natural calamities, pests, and disease.
